title: Episode 275: The Juice Catcher (Feat. Reason)
itunes:title: Episode 275: The Juice Catcher (Feat. Reason)
description:
TDE Rapper, Reason, is here to promote his album “New Beginnings.” Reason opens up about the unconventional way he handled being cat-fished, the difficulties women face navigating the music industry, women being more harsh than men if the sex is bad, and much more. Reason even addresses Drake after he mentioned that he dated SZA on “Mr Right Now,” he speaks on the shots he through at Logic, and his mindset behind the song “Windows Cry.” Enjoy! 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:author: Angela Yee, Inc.
